attributes.description:
CASH ONLY
Please visit our website for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice.  
Great reliable car in good working order & good for everyday uses. The Car was bought as a trade in, and No work was done on it & We are selling it at a Wholesale price with NO WARRANTY. If you want something that has space, good for business and will last you a lifetime then she is the one for you. She comes with Aircon,Electric windows, electric mirrors and many more  E&O
COME AND VIEW! 
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
Patrick: 068 521 2876
David : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133
(Should you require any AFTER HOURS assistance please call our landline, follow the voice prompt and Press 1 for sales and we will gladly assist you!)
